entry.title: 5 Pack | Linen Chair Sashes, Slubby Textured Wrinkle Resistant Sashes - Blush | Rose Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2140
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 5.79

[About]

Quantity: 5 pcs
Material: Faux Linen
Color: Blush | Rose Gold
Length: 108" long
Width: 6" wide
GSM: ﻿160
Serged edges for an exquisite look
These High Quality sashes are made from fine polyester yarn with beautiful, textured weaves.
Features: Slubby Texture, Wrinkle Resistant, Anti-Shrink, Soft and supple
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information] 

    Faux Linen Chair Sashes

    Combining the stylish slubby texture with soft and supple fabric, our Faux Linen Chair Sashes will add a chic country charm to your party or wedding chairs. Crafted from high quality super fine polyester yarns, the textured weaved design of these sashes will surely add a dash of whimsy to any plain party or banquet chairs.

    Seamless Finish & Serged Edges

    Featuring seamless finish and serged edges, our soft and textured Chair Sashes are completely wrinkle resistant. Thus, making your party setting procedure a breeze. Simply swathe around your plain banquet or folding chairs, or pair with plush chair covers and chair skirts for an added flair. Adorn with our sash pins, succulents, or flower heads for a truly mesmeric presentation.

    Durable and Reusable

    Durable and reusable, these sturdy chair sashes are anti-shrink and wrinkle free, this makes them ideal to be used time and time again to spruce your merry moments up. Perfect for weddings, birthdays, showers, holiday parties, family dinners, and corporate events, these soft and supple sashes will give your plain chairs a sophisticated twist.


    Additional Information:

    • Fabric: Faux Linen
    • Serged Width: 5mm
    • Fabric Care: Machine wash with cold water with mild detergent. For best results air dry.
    • Cannot put in Dryer. Air Dry ONLY
    • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
    • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

[Information]

Plan as many events as you want and invite as many guest as you desire without even worrying about the expenses and your budget. With our sturdy and economical Buffalo Plaid polyester gingham chair sashes, you can now transform any dining experience into a magnificent feast with an upscale feel and an elite look without breaking the banks. Now you can relish that spring picnic feeling any time anywhere with our Perfect Picnic Inspired Buffalo Plaid Checkered Polyester Sashes. The inspiring and recreational Buffalo Plaid design brings back the memories of happy picnic times in gardens and by the river side. Create a peaceful and serene party ambiance with our luxury Polyester Sashes fashioned in chic checkered design to exude positive energy and a classy look to your Chairs. Enjoy eat al fresco time with your friends and family wherever your heart desires!

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • How to Care: Machine washable, cold water, gentle cycle
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations.
